full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BDE BA CAN DU SKYES PA'I SMON LAM DANG SHAMBHA LA'I SMON LAM BZHUGS SO, , *, ,BDE BA CAN GYI SMON LAM MDOR BSDUS NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @001B (CES BDE BA CAN GYI SMON LAM MDOR BSDUS 'DI NI HAL HA TSI TSIN RGYAL KHAG ^TSI TSIN JUNG WANG GI CHOS GRVA GA-YON PA DPAL LDAN BKRA SHIS @002A *, ,SGO MANG GLING GI BRGYUD GRVA'I BLA ZUR TES CH'I BLA SA RABS 'BYAMS PA SHES RAB DPAL BZANG LAGS KYI LHA RDZAS BCAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^AANGY'A SVA: SKYES MING DU 'BOD PA, LHA BTZUN BSTAN RIN MING CAN GYIS ^SA SKYONG KH'I BE KUN GYI GRVA TSANG GA-YAS PA DGE LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING DU SUG BRIS SU BGYI BA'O,, ,,)
